sentences.sContent: This made no sense. All the eggs are fertilized already.
sentences.sContent_eng: This made no sense. All the eggs are fertilized already.
sentences.sCn: 这可说不通，因为所有的卵都已经受精了。

sentences.sContent: But why should a molecule found on fertilized eggs release such fury?
sentences.sContent_eng: But why should a molecule found on fertilized eggs release such fury?
sentences.sCn: 但是为什么受精卵上的分子可以造成如此的愤怒。

sentences.sContent: After allowing the virus to infect the eggs, the team fertilized them with normal cat sperm and injected them into the fallopian tubes of 22 female cats.
sentences.sContent_eng: After allowing the virus to infect the eggs, the team fertilized them with normal cat sperm and injected them into the fallopian tubes of 22 female cats.
sentences.sCn: 病毒感染卵细胞之后，小组用正常猫精子使卵细胞受精，并且把这些受精卵注入22只雌性猫的输卵管中。
